description: This budget-friendly beef and vegetable casserole is easy to make and is packed with hearty seasonal vegetables. You can also batch cook and freeze for later.
keywords: Stew & casserole,Seafood free,Low salt,Fresh ingredients,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Potato,High protein,High fibre,Parsnip,One-pot,Soy free,Comfort food,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Beef & Vegetable Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs oil in a large heatproof casserole dish over a medium heat. Lightly coat beef with flour. Add 1/4 of meat and cook for 5 minutes or until well browned. Transfer to a large plate. Cook remaining portions of beef, adding more oil as required.

Preheat oven to 200°C. Heat remaining oil in casserole. Add onion, parsnip, potatoes, carrots and celery. Cook, stirring often for 8-10 minutes or until just tender. Add tomatoes and stock and bring to the boil. Cover and place in oven. Cook for 1 hour. Remove lid and cook for a further 20-30 minutes or until thick and rich. Stir through parsley and serve.
